settings.text:
Be the first one to find out about product announcements, news and updates.

© MOJO Wellbeing
Add your announcement message with a bit more length

settings.content_html:
Solutions to help you take on menopause with confidence

Hot Flash Relief Supplement + Multivitamin

* We’re scientists, not magicians. Mojo Wellbeing has been formulated with ingredients clinically proven to provide relief for hot flashes.

* Menopause is more than hot flashes. So Mojo Wellbeing is packed with a blend of vitamins A, C, E and F that supports women’s health and overall wellbeing, boosting beauty from the inside out.

* And we didn’t stop there. Mojo Wellbeing also contains ashwaghanda, an adaptogen that works naturally with your body to balance mood fluctuations.

* Women go through enough hormonal changes as it is, which is why Mojo Wellbeing is hormone-free. Keeping it natural, vegan and cruelty-free.

settings.grid_header: Only the good Stuff
settings.grid_title_1: hormone-free. Keeping it natural, vegan and cruelty-free.

settings.grid_title_3: hormone-free. Keeping it natural, vegan and cruelty-free.

settings.content_html:
Don’t let menopause take your mojo

Our upcoming range of products are made to help you deal with all the ways menopause can affect your mind, body and soul. Because we know menopause doesn’t end with hot flashes.

Menopause happens to the best of us (ok, all of us).
It’s time to get through it with confidence.

Perimenopause is real.
Why do so few women know about it?

For some it starts with a hot flash at 40. For others, irregular periods at 51. But one way or another, menopause happens to every woman. And yet no one is talking about it.* Decades of confidence wobble at the words “hot flash”** (Don’t even get us started on “vaginal dryness”).

That’s where we come in. Mojo Wellbeing offers real solutions. Honest answers. No BS. Just the hot, sweaty truth about moving into menopause. AKA perimenopause. Yep, it’s real. And every woman goes through it. Don’t you think it’s time we started dealing with it?

*Seriously?!
**But I thought those happened to older women?!

Menopause is natural.
Talking about it should be, too.

Join a growing community of women normalizing the conversation around menopause.

Products to help you keep your mojo

Discover our first product, made to keep you cool, calm and collected through menopause.

Menopause,
meet your match

Get through menopause with your mojo intact.

Menopause is confusing as hell. We've got answers.
And better yet, we've got solutions.

Our first product is a hot flash relief supplement and multivitamin to help you keep your cool through menopause.

*Clinically proven to provide relief for hot flashes
*Packed with vitamin A, C, E and F
*Contains the mood-balancing adaptogen ashwagandha
*Vegan, natural and hormone-free
